__TOC__

A list of accessibility bugs currently affecting feisty.

'''Note:''' ''If you have encountered a problem please file a bug in the bug tracker and tag it as 'accessibility'. Then list  it here with a link.'''

'''Bugs by category:'''

=== Braille ===

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~accessibility/+subscribedbugs|brltty starts twice on boot]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/brltty/+bug/86857|libbrlapi1 file overwrite with brltty]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/brltty/+bug/40064|conffile prompt on uprgade]]</nowiki>

=== Keyboard ===

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/control-center/+bug/65921|slow key dialog not controllable by keyboard]]</nowiki>
